item.title: Micro Frontends Microservices For Frontend Development
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is Micro-frontend ? An architectural style where independently deliverable frontend applications are composed into a greater whole Benefits Smaller, more cohesive, and maintainable codebases More scalable organizations with decoupled, autonomous teams The ability to upgrade, update, or even rewrite parts of the frontend in a more incremental fashion than was previously possible Easier maintenance: Keeping frontend repositories small and specialized allows them to be more easily understood, and this simplifies long-term maintenance and testing.
